articles.author: Sergiu Gatlan
articles.title: Microsoft blocks Windows 11 24H2 on some Intel PCs over BSOD issues - BleepingComputer
articles.description: ​Microsoft is blocking Windows 24H2 upgrades on systems with incompatible Intel Smart Sound Technology (SST) audio drivers due to blue screen of death (BSOD) issues.
articles.content:
​Microsoft is blocking Windows 24H2 upgrades on systems with incompatible Intel Smart Sound Technology (SST) audio drivers due to blue screen of death (BSOD) issues.
Intel SST is an integrated audio… [+2126 chars]
